CustomField.description: The portion of the senders email before the @ symbol. This is automatically joined with the Domain Name to produce the From Email. For example an Email Handle of 'marketing' and a Domain Name of 'emergencelabs.io' will produce 'marketing@emergencelabs.io'
CustomField.inlineHelpText: The portion of the senders email before the @ symbol. This is automatically joined with the Domain Name to produce the From Email. For example an Email Handle of 'marketing' and a Domain Name of 'emergencelabs.io' will produce 'marketing@emergencelabs.io'
CustomField.label: Email Handle
